00028 #include "qf_pkg.h"

00037 // Package-scope objects -----------------------------------------------------
00038 QTimeEvt *QF_timeEvtListHead_;           // head of linked list of time events
00039 
00040 //............................................................................
00041 void QTimeEvt::arm_(QActive *act, QTimeEvtCtr nTicks) {
00042     Q_REQUIRE((nTicks > (QTimeEvtCtr)0)          /* cannot arm with 0 ticks */
00043               && (sig >= (QSignal)Q_USER_SIG)               /* valid signal */
00044               && (m_prev == (QTimeEvt *)0)   /* time event must NOT be used */
00045               && (act != (QActive *)0));  /* active object must be provided */
00046     m_ctr = nTicks;
00047     m_prev = this;                                    // mark the timer in use
00048     m_act = act;
00049     QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00050     QF_INT_LOCK_();
00051 
00052     QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_TIMEEVT_ARM, QS::teObj_, this)
00053         QS_TIME_();                                               // timestamp
00054         QS_OBJ_(this);                               // this time event object
00055         QS_OBJ_(act);                                     // the active object
00056         QS_TEC_(nTicks);                                // the number of ticks
00057         QS_TEC_(m_interval);                                   // the interval
00058     QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00059 
00060     m_next = QF_timeEvtListHead_;
00061     if (QF_timeEvtListHead_ != (QTimeEvt *)0) {
00062         QF_timeEvtListHead_->m_prev = this;
00063     }
00064     QF_timeEvtListHead_ = this;
00065     QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00066 }
